name: Constructo - Dungeons Builder
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING THE GAME

Constructo - Dungeons Builder was recently funded through the Kickstarter platform (project link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/playloopstudios/constructo-dungeons-builder ).

The currently released version is the Alpha version, but you must be a backer to use it. Currently you can still purchase access to the Alpha through our late-pledge: https://constructo.backerkit.com/hosted_preorders

If you need more information please contact us on our Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/gpAypMnjSY

Website: https://www.playloopstudios.com

WHAT IS CONSTRUCTO - DUNGEONS BUILDER?

Constructo is a tool that turns your imagination into reality. A virtual tabletop that packs a set of tools for your favorite tabletop RPG! Say goodbye to those unappealing last-second sketches and instead see maps with your own eyes in an incredible pulsating 3D full of life. That fire-breathing dragon has never looked so realistic!

HOW TO CREATE A MAP?

With the internal editor, you create your favorite maps. You can add  walls, floors, columns, and anything else you need to lay the  foundation for your dungeon. 

DO CLASSIC INDOOR SETTINGS FEEL CRAMPED?

Expand your boundaries. Bring the world to life with the terrain editor. Raise and lower the ground to your liking; level it, smooth it,  create your ideal world. Afterwards, color and customize it. Give free rein to your imagination.

LIMITED TIME?

We understand that not everyone has the time to customize everything as they would like. For this reason, Constructo will include an internal marketplace, where you will be able to download other players creations and share yours! As content creators, users will be able to sell their creations or make them free for everyone.

CREATE YOUR CHARACTER AS YOU LIKE BEST

shape the body, choose the hair, beard, and eye color. Equip it and be ready for action!

IMPORT YOUR OWN MODELS

Do you have a large library of 3D miniatures that you would like to use? Don't want to give up on that particular 3D object you love? (a temple, a ruined bridge, an airship, etc.) Why waste them? Import them into Constructo and use them as you wish, you have all the freedom in the world!

FOG OF WAR

Tired of your players seeing what awaits them ahead? Activate the Fog of War and say bye to it all!

DARKVISION

Players with the special Darkvision ability will be able to see in the dark without any problems! Oops, where are the colors ?!
